gw.api.policy

Class ClaimPolicyMakeEditableUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.policy.ClaimPolicyMakeEditableUtil

  • public class ClaimPolicyMakeEditableUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for making a policy editable in the UI. An editable Policy is "unverified", meaning that its veracity is unkown.
    Author:
    efoley

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void makePolicyEditable(Location location, Claim claim)
      Make the Policy editable, without leaving the current location in the "edited" state.
      static void makePolicyEditable(Location location, Claim claim, boolean leaveLocationEditable)
      Make the Policy editable, and conditionally leave the location in the "edited" state.
      static void makePolicyWithInternalFieldsEditable(Location location, Claim claim)
      Makes the Policy editable only if the action event parameter is "true".

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • makePolicyEditable

        public static void makePolicyEditable(Location location,
                                      Claim claim)
        Make the Policy editable, without leaving the current location in the "edited" state. The location is committed.
        Parameters:
        location - The current location - it will be committed.
        claim - The Claim whose Policy to make editable.

      • makePolicyEditable

        public static void makePolicyEditable(Location location,
                                      Claim claim,
                                      boolean leaveLocationEditable)
        Make the Policy editable, and conditionally leave the location in the "edited" state. The location is committed in this process.
        Parameters:
        location - The current location - it will be committed.
        claim - The Claim whose Policy to make editable.
        leaveLocationEditable - if true the location is left in an editable state after it is committed.

      • makePolicyWithInternalFieldsEditable

        @Deprecated(value="This method has been deprecated in ClaimCenter 6.0.1.  Use makePolicyEditable() instead, with the appropriate controls in place, to make the full policy editable when it is verified, or just use CurrentLocation.startEditing() to only make ClaimCenter internal fields editable without deverifying the policy.")
public static void makePolicyWithInternalFieldsEditable(Location location,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Claim claim)
        Makes the Policy editable only if the action event parameter is "true".
        Parameters:
        location - The current location - it will be committed.
        claim - The Claim whose Policy to make editable.
